name: Broccoli and Cauliflower Bake
author: Karen Moorse
summary: This broccoli and cauliflower bake is a favorite side for a turkey dinner that can be easily prepared the day before.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (15 ounce) package seasoned croutons, finely crushed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook, uncovered, until tender, 3 to 4 minutes
Drain in a colander and rinse under cold running water
Transfer to the prepared casserole dish, making sure vegetables are evenly distributed
Mix in cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, and onion
Pour evenly over vegetables in the casserole dish
Sprinkle the remaining 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese over the top and level with a spoon
Pour melted butter over the entire casserole
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is hot and bubbling, about 40 minutes
